name: Blinding Caves
description:
Blinding Caves

Blinding Caves is a short game made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 42!

The theme was : Running out of space !

In this game you have to complete simple platformer levels, but the deeper you go in the cave, the fewer visibility you have, so take your time!

Controls

A and D : Move

Space : Jump

click & drag : move the camera

Have fun !

Game made with GM Studio 1.4

Music made with Bosca Ceoil

Art made with Pyxel Edit
